Mr. Frank E. Schooley, Executive Secretary
Hie National Association of Educational Broadcasters
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
% dear Frank*
I know that you aren't asleep. As a matter of
fact, we have had correspondence since September, haven't
we?
I hope you make your point with Mr. Slowie. You
know how I feel about the matter. Truthfully, I've just
allowed the matter to ride and so far nothing has hap¬
pened.
Sincerely yours,
MSN: sd
‘New York City's Own Station"—810 Kc.
